snippets:
[    // Math mode
    {trigger: "rr", replacement: "\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "zz", replacement: "\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cc", replacement: "\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "os", replacement: "\overset{}{}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "us", replacement: "underset{}{}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "then", replacement: "\Longrightarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cos", replacement: "cos", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lim", replacement: "lim_{}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "inf", replacement: "infty", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "left{", replacement: "left\{\begin{matrix} \end{matrix}\right.", options:"mA"},
    {trigger: "right{", replacement: "\left.\begin{matrix} \end{matrix}\right\}", options:"mA"},
    {trigger: "sse", replacement: "subseteq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sqrt", replacement: "sqrt{}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "frac", replacement: "frac{}{}", options: "mA"},
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
autoEnlargeBracketsTriggers: sum, int, frac, prod, bigcup, bigcap
